org.micromanager.display

Interface DisplaySettings.Builder

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    DisplaySettings.DisplaySettingsBuilder
    Enclosing interface:
    DisplaySettings

    public static interface DisplaySettings.Builder
    Builder for DisplaySettings. Get an instance using the DisplayManager displaySettingsBuilder() method or by using one of the copy() methods of an existing DisplaySettings instance.

      • channel

        DisplaySettings.Builder channel(int channel)
        Increases the number of ChannelDisplaySettings in this Builder to the given number. DefaultSettings for each channel will be added.
        Parameters:
        channel - Final number of ChannelDisplaySettings
        Returns:
        builder instance to enable chaining commands

      • channel

        DisplaySettings.Builder channel(int channel,
                                ChannelDisplaySettings settings)
        Sets the ChannelDisplaySettings for the given channel. If the number of ChannelDisplaySettings is smaller than the given channel number, "missing" channels will be added (using Default Display Settings).
        Parameters:
        channel - Indicates the number of the channel for which to set the DisplaySettings
        Returns:
        builder instance to enable chaining commands

      • channels

        DisplaySettings.Builder channels(java.lang.Iterable<ChannelDisplaySettings> channelSettings)
        Replaces ChannelDisplaySettings with those given. If provided with null or an empty list, current ChannelDisplaySettings will be removed.
        Parameters:
        channelSettings - iterable with ChannelDisplaySettings to replace the current ones. Can be empty or null, in which case ChannelDisplaySettings will be removed from this builder.
        Returns:
        builder instance to enable chaining commands

      • getNumberOfChannels

        int getNumberOfChannels()
        Number of ChannelDisplaySettings in this builder. Not sure why a builder needs this...
        Returns:
        Number of ChannelDisplaySettings in this Builder.

      • getChannelSettings

        ChannelDisplaySettings getChannelSettings(int channel)
        Returns the ChannelDisplaySettings for the given channel number. If this, or any channel with lower number, does not exist, it will be created, and filled with DefaultChannelDisplaySettings.
        Parameters:
        channel - Number (index) of the requested channel
        Returns:
        ChannelDisplaySettings for the requested channel.

      • build

        DisplaySettings build()
